name: Zen Lines
description:
Experience a beautifully designed game to test your Zen skills. Guide your Zen balls through the obstacles to attain Zen master status. Lose yourself in beautiful meditative music along the way. To attain Zen master status, you must navigate the obstacles and lines for over 250 seconds - easier said then done!
Zen lines use 3D Touch, so the ball movement is dependent on how much pressure you place on the screen.
